User instruction: 创建新文档并添加标题"销售业绩报告"，添加页眉显示"销售部"。
Feasible API sequence: create_and_save_docx(doc_path, "");add_heading(doc_path, "销售业绩报告", level=1);add_header(doc_path, "销售部");

User instruction: 添加二级标题"销售概况"、"业绩分析"和"未来展望"。
Feasible API sequence: add_heading(doc_path, "销售概况", level=2);add_heading(doc_path, "业绩分析", level=2);add_heading(doc_path, "未来展望", level=2);

User instruction: 在"销售概况"下插入一个折线图展示月度销售额。
Feasible API sequence: create_line_chart(["1月", "2月", "3月", "4月", "5月", "6月"], [100, 120, 150, 140, 160, 180], title="月度销售额趋势", xlabel="月份", ylabel="销售额（万元）");

User instruction: 在"业绩分析"下插入一个饼图展示各产品线销售占比。
Feasible API sequence: create_pie_chart(["产品A", "产品B", "产品C", "产品D"], [40, 30, 20, 10], title="产品线销售占比");

User instruction: 在"未来展望"下添加带编号的列表项。
Feasible API sequence: add_list_item(doc_path, "扩大市场份额", style="List Number");add_list_item(doc_path, "开发新产品线", style="List Number");add_list_item(doc_path, "提升客户满意度", style="List Number");
